description: Succulent roast chicken recipe with a golden garlic and panko breadcrumb coating is a must try for a delicious and easy dinner.
name: Cheesy 'Garlic Bread'-Crusted Roast Chicken Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1.5 kg Woolworths RSPCA Approved Seasoned Whole Chicken

recipeInstructions.text: Place chicken on a serving platter. Arrange remaining broccolini around chicken, top with oregano and season with pepper. Serve with cheesy broccolini and lemon wedges.
